Definition.Name: CrowdStrike Falcon Starting Playbook
Definition.Description: CrowdStrike Falcon Starting Playbook provides reference implementation of how CrowdStrike Falcon alerts can be processed in Google SecOps.
Definition.Creator: e22b1df1-d620-4af5-ba42-d29e1b73bfe9

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Case Tag
Steps.Description: Add given tag to the case the current alert is grouped to

Steps.Name: CrowdStrikeFalcon_Get Host Information
Steps.Description: Retrieve information about the hostname from Crowdstrike Falcon. Supported entities: Hostname, IP Address.

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Case Tag
Steps.Description: Add given tag to the case the current alert is grouped to

Steps.Name: Google Workspace Enrichment
Steps.Description: An embedded workflow that can receive inputs and return an output.

Steps.Name: CrowdStrike Containment
Steps.Description: An embedded workflow that can receive inputs and return an output.

Steps.Name: Condition
Steps.Description: This condition determines the progress of the playbook. Conditions are built based on cases data (cases, alerts, vents, entities and environment properties) as-well as data that comes back from previous playbook steps.

Steps.Name: GoogleChronicle_Get Detection Details
Steps.Description: Fetch information about a detection in Google Chronicle.

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Case Tag
Steps.Description: Add given tag to the case the current alert is grouped to

Steps.Name: CrowdStrikeFalcon_List Host Vulnerabilities
Steps.Description: List vulnerabilities found on the host in Crowdstrike Falcon. Supported entities: IP Address and Hostname. Note: requires Falcon Spotlight license and permissions.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Customer ID":"","Severity Filter":"","Create Insight":true,"Max Vulnerabilities To Return":"100"}

Steps.Description: An embedded workflow that can receive inputs and return an output.

Steps.Name: Tools_Set Context Value
Steps.Description: The action sets a key and value in a specific context (alert or case)

Steps.Description: An embedded workflow that can receive inputs and return an output.

Steps.Description: An embedded workflow that can receive inputs and return an output.

Steps.Description: An embedded workflow that can receive inputs and return an output.

Steps.Name: High Risk Users Check
Steps.Description: This block checks GTI sourced alerts against a SOAR custom list to find matches of Targeted Industries
